name: Elytron
description: This heavy duty Archwing was designed for one purpose, destruction.

abilities.name: Bloomer
abilities.description: Fires a high-yield, remotely detonated explosive projectile capable of latching onto targets.

abilities.name: Core Vent
abilities.description: Vents out the Archwing's propulsion core, confusing enemy projectiles and causing them to detonate.

abilities.name: Thumper
abilities.description: Creates a localized storm of punishing explosions.

abilities.name: Warhead
abilities.description: Launches a plodding missile capable of unleashing a massive explosion.

patchlogs.name: Chains of Harrow: Hotfix 21.1.1
patchlogs.fixes: More fixes towards Energy color issues when using Core Vent on the Elytron.

patchlogs.name: Octavia's Anthem: Update 20
patchlogs.fixes: Potential fix for Elytron’s Warhead ability having an enormous cooldown time.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.1.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Clients seeing duplicate visual FX trails from the Elytron’s exhaust.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.9.0
patchlogs.changes: Reduced the particle FX on Elytron’s Core Vent Ability.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.2
patchlogs.changes: The Elytron`s Thumper will now combine with previous Thumpers if it detonates within its radius. This will refresh the duration on the previous Thumper and allow damage to stack up to 4 times.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.8.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed another issue causing players to take damage from Elytron’s Warhead ability.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.8.1 + 16.8.2
patchlogs.fixes: Rolled back a fix for Elytron's Thumper causing self damage

patchlogs.name: Update 16.8.0
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed incorrect color on the Elytron’s Thumper ability.
Fixed an issue allowing players to take damage from Elytron’s Warhead.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.3.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Elytron Warhead damage and radius not increasing when ranked up.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.2.0
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed description for Elytron’s Core Vent ability incorrectly stated that it hurts enemies.
Fixed Elytron’s Core Vent not affecting Dreg Spheres.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.0.7
patchlogs.fixes: • Fixed an issue with erroneous Elytron Wing descriptions.

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Archwing
patchlogs.changes:
Archwing has arrived!  Players Mastery Rank 2 or greater can quest to assemble the Archwing technology allowing for space combat sans spacecraft.  Two unique game modes, new enemies, weapons and Mods are all available.  Choose from the offensive Elytron Archwing or well-rounded Odonata and bring the fight straight to the enemy, Tenno!
Elytron. An Archwing that includes 4 unique abilities that offer incredible firepower to destroy your enemies!

name: Itzal
description: Designed for quick clandestine attacks, the Itzal Archwing excels at striking from the darkness of space.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: The Itzal Archwing teleports a short distance, dropping all enemy target locks.

abilities.name: Penumbra
abilities.description: Activates a cloaking field that hides the Warframe and any nearby allies who remain stationary.

abilities.name: Cosmic Crush
abilities.description: Forms a miniature black hole that sucks in all nearby objects before rupturing in a massive shock wave.

abilities.name: Fighter Escort
abilities.description: Deploys drones that fight alongside the Warframe, each detonating in a destructive blast when killed.

components.name: Blueprint
components.description: Designed for quick clandestine attacks, the Itzal Archwing excels at striking from the darkness of space.

patchlogs.name: The Sacrifice: Update 23.3.0 + 23.3.0.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Itzal Fighter Escort drones pausing if you get too far away from them.

patchlogs.name: Shrine of the Eidolon: Update 22.17.3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed a script error when using Itzal’s Penumbra ability.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.11.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixes towards a progression stopping issue where Jordas would not dock properly caused by Itzal’s Blink stun effect.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Hotfix 22.8.3
patchlogs.changes: Itzal Penumbra now turns off sprint toggle so you don't immediately cancel out of the cloak when using it.

patchlogs.name: Plains of Eidolon: Update 22.2.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixes towards Bounties insta failing if an ability to teleport (Nova’s Wormhole, Itzal’s Blink, etc) was used to enter the Bounty area.

patchlogs.name: Octavia’s Anthem: Hotfix 20.2.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Itzal Fighter Escorts causing camera issues.

patchlogs.name: The Index Preview: Hotfix #4
patchlogs.changes: Archwing Part Blueprints (i.e Itzal Harness, etc.) are no longer tradable.

patchlogs.name: The Vacuum Within: Hotfix #3
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Itzal's Blink colliding with Odonata's Energy Shell as per: https://forums.warframe.com/topic/705690-itzals-blink-broken-interaction-with-energy-field/

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: Hotfix 12
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed Itzal’s Penumbra ability not working properly.
Fixed being able to move while casting Itzal’s Penumbra as a Client.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.11.0 & 18.11.1
patchlogs.fixes: •    Fixed Itzal’s Fighter Escorts counting as squadmates in stage 1 of The Jordas Verdict, leaving other players stuck outside not able to progress.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 18.0.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an error that would occur after the Itzal’s drones would die.

patchlogs.name: Update 18: The Second Dream
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed several issues causing players to become stuck in terrain after using the Itzal’s Blink Ability.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.12.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed players being able to teleport through terrain using the Itzal during Stage 3 of the Jordas Verdict.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 17.11.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue during Stage 3 of the Jordas Verdict when using Itzal’s Blink ability.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.8.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue where Itzal's Blink was not usable in Archwing Mobile Defense.

patchlogs.name: Update 17.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Itzal’s Cloak not deactivating on movement.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.3.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed kills from Chroma’s Effigy, Nekros’ Shadows of the Dead and the Itzal Archwing’s Fighter Escort not counting towards player stats.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.13
patchlogs.changes: Itzal Archwing’s Support Drones will now gain the same color tints of the Archwing.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.12.0
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Itzal Archwing’s Codex entry to display a Warframe wearing the Itzal in the diorama.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.11
patchlogs.changes:
Increased the Itzal Archwing’s Fighter Escort Ability to 20.
Added visual effect for Itzal’s Fighter Escort drones exploding once the Ability expires.
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Itzal Archwing’s Fighter Escort drones explosion range not properly increasing as you rank up.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.9
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed the Itzal Archwing’s Blink Ability allowing players to teleport through objects they shouldn’t be able to.
Fixed typo in the Itzal Pack Market description.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.7.2 + 15.7.2.1
patchlogs.fixes:
ITZAL ARCHWING: Designed for quick clandestine attacks, the Itzal Archwing excels at striking from the darkness of space.
Blink: The Itzal Archwing teleports a short distance, dropping all enemy target locks.
Start your Research for the Itzal and Fluctus in the Clan Dojo, and purchase the blueprint for the Centaur from the Marketplace today!

patchlogs.changes: Reduced the Odonata crafting costs and replaced Control Module with Neurodes for better new user experience/path.

patchlogs.name: Update 18.5: Sands of Inaros
patchlogs.fixes: Archwing Crafting requirements have been adjusted for players crafting the Odonata in The Archwing Quest:

patchlogs.name: Update 17.4.5
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Odonata Archwing’s Seeking Fire Ability doing damage to the player on use.

patchlogs.name: Update 17: Echoes Of The Sentient
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue caused by building the Odonata while the Archwing Quest is still inactive, causing an error when activating the quest in the World State Window.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 16.1.1
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Odonata Prime parts not being tradable.

patchlogs.name: Update 16.1: Volt Prime
patchlogs.fixes:
including Volt Prime, Odonata Prime, Edo Prime Armor and the Kazeru Prime Sugatra. Plus, stock up on discounted Platinum and get Exclusive Gear available only through Prime Access!
Take flight with Odonata Prime.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.9
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed generic Archwing Mods saying they are compatible with only the Odonata.  They will now properly say ‘Archwing’.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.2.0
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed Odonata’s Disarray not affecting Dreg Spheres.
Fixed the activation of Odonata Archwing abilities not properly issuing 25/50/75/100 Affinity respective of ability used (1/2/3/4).

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.1.2
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed an issue with Odonata’s Energy Shell impeding Melee attack homing on enemies.

patchlogs.name: Warframe: Archwing
patchlogs.changes:
Archwing has arrived!  Players Mastery Rank 2 or greater can quest to assemble the Archwing technology allowing for space combat sans spacecraft.  Two unique game modes, new enemies, weapons and Mods are all available.  Choose from the offensive Elytron Archwing or well-rounded Odonata and bring the fight straight to the enemy, Tenno!
Odonata. An Archwing that includes 4 unique abilities that equally protect and devastate your enemies!

name: Prisma Veritux
description: A rare object of beauty, this Archwing sword has been sheathed in prisma crystal and baptized in the void’s energy.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.13.7
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Prisma Veritux not being Tradeable.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.13.4
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed the Prisma Veritux being untradeable.

name: Rathbone
description: Using Archwing’s jets for thrust, this massive hammer crushes anything in its path.

patchlogs.name: Specters of the Rail: Hotfix 13
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed not being able to obtain Corvas and Rathbone Blueprint parts.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.2.1 +15.2.2
patchlogs.fixes:
Fixed Rathbone requiring two handles to craft, now reduced to one handle.
Fixed Rathbone having 9 Mod slots, reduced to 8.

name: Velocitus
description: When fully charged, the magnetized barrel of the Velocitus accelerates a metal slug to tremendous speeds, piercing hulls and obliterating armor.

patchlogs.name: Update: Lunaro
patchlogs.fixes: •    Fixed a script error when exiting the water with a Velocitus equipped.

patchlogs.name: Update 18: The Second Dream
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed players being able to damage a Fomorian Core multiple times with a single shot using the Velocitus.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.7.2 + 15.7.2.1
patchlogs.changes: Increased Velocitus’ damage from 1200 to 1800.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.5.6
patchlogs.fixes: Fixed Velocitus weapon fire sound ending prematurely, also corrected various weapon fire animations.

patchlogs.name: Mesa Update
patchlogs.changes: Updated visual on Velocitus hit effect, increased visual distance of shot.

patchlogs.name: Hotfix 15.2.1 +15.2.2
patchlogs.changes:
Updated Velocitus firing sounds.
Reduced lens flare effect on Velocitus.
Bigger hit effect on the Velocitus’ projectile.
Small buff to Velocitus’ damage, included ability to sweep a sphere giving some ‘slack’ on the shot.

patchlogs.name: Update 15.2.0
patchlogs.additions: When fully charged, the magnetized barrel of the Velocitus accelerates a metal slug to tremendous speeds, piercing hulls and obliterating armor.

name: Veritux
description: Weightless space turns this impossibly massive sword into an agile instrument of destruction.
